tool_description: Over 2000 Inspiring Quotes For Your App / Website, The Api Returns A Random Quote With The Name Of The Author On Every Request, This Is My First Public Api, I Would Appreciate Any Kind Of Support.
name: Inspiring quotes
title: Inspiring quotes

api_list.name: Get multiple inspiring quotes
api_list.description: This request gets you number of random quotes specified by the query parameter 'count' that are all different and inspiring in their way.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
number of random quotes to be returned
note: number must be between 3 and 50

optional_parameters.name: author
optional_parameters.description: filters quotes to the ones that contains this query parameter value

api_list.name: Get a random quote
api_list.description: This request gets you one random quote that inspire you to continue through this rough life.

optional_parameters.name: author
optional_parameters.description: filters quotes to the ones that contains this query parameter value
